menu.study-instructions-text:
This study aims at making you test the ‘LEARN’, ‘GET INSPIRED’ and ‘MAP’ functions, in 2 STEPS.

STEP 1 (5’): UNDERSTAND EACH FUNCTION
Get an overview of all the three functions, quickly exploring them one after the other in the listed order. You are required to say aloud what the given function does before moving to the next.

STEP 2 (15’): MAP OL-RELATED ACTIVITY
Spend some time deepening your OL knowledge with the final goal of mapping an OL-related didactic activity that you carried out.
You can move freely across functions.

NB You are not expected to absorb as much information as possible, but to simply navigate OL knowledge based on your curiosity and interests.

If you feel stuck, you can ask us for help.
Please always think aloud, and enjoy!
